column1: The  matter  was  fixed  for  inquiry  and  on  26.03.2001,  when  it  was

taken  up  for 
inquiry  the  Counsel  for  the  Appellant  raised  a  preliminary
objection with regard to the maintainability of the action that had not risen at

the time of filing the objections. 
It was the contention of the Appellant that,
as the Respondent is not the  Competent Authority, he has no locus standi to
